description.en:
Akira Ichijo is your average, run-of-the-mill businessman.

One day, on his way home from work, he is suddenly attacked by a Minotaur and killed on the spot. But in the blink of an eye... he wakes up back at the office!

When monsters invade into the real world, a cruel reality sets in as the world as we know it plummets into destruction and death. But with the unique skill [Resurrection], Akira can come back to life every time he dies, all the while inheriting the same levels and skills from his last run at life!

With unlimited chances to correct his past mistakes, it's up to Akira to utilize the skill he's given and survive this terrifying world with his childhood friend, Nao Nanase.

Unknowingly swapped upon birth, Princess Brianna lost her identity as a princess and became a vagrant orphan. One day, her Imperial Father suddenly sought her back, reinstating her back to her rightful identity as the nation's princess. However, what awaited her was not a family reunion nor was it an extravagant life, but instead, she was to become a sacrifice for the god. Reincarnated into the body of Princess Brianna, our main character only wants to change her fate of death, yet realises that the best way to do so is to become the sacrifice. The only way she can live is by becoming the sacrifice, as hidden scheming along with its causes and effects, slowly unravel in front of her eyes. (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)

(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

**Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)
description.zh: （架空朝代）大陈年间，菁贵妃霞光中诞下双生龙凤胎。皇子生来眉间一颗朱砂痣，皇女天生六指 。祥瑞与不祥同时出现，令同胞双生的二人迎来截然不同的命运，被迫与至亲分离。天劫将至，自出生便相离的他们是否能重逢？彼此又以何种方式与天命相争？

description.en:
"A useless thing like you has no value in our family. Take this money and leave immediately!"

"Yes! Goodbye!"

She became the incompetent villainess who commits wrongdoings in order to earn the love of her fiancé, the male lead. Her reputation was already at rock bottom and the main characters, who can't live without each other, are having an affair.

"Getting kicked out and receiving money is good enough!"

So after she was kicked out, she set up a stationery store in front of a school. She reminisces of snacks, beer candy, and even bubbles! Just you wait, kids! But… somehow her young customers are a little weird?

"I'll find you a handsome and modest man, and not someone who has an affair like my brother!"

"Ha, then what about my brother, the crown prince?”

"…the tower master is the best."

The great magic swordsman, the crown prince, the villainous tower master, and finally, the hidden villain. The stationery store, which she thought would be peaceful, left her with no rest.

*Help me! I just wanted to live a normal life!*

---
What's a girl to do when she wakes up in the body of a villainess? Meldenique Babelloa is a supporting character in a romance novel starring her fiancé, Duke Lennox Hessman, and… her sister, Sheria! Heartbroken, she eventually dies a tragic death as a villainess… or so the original story goes. Determined not to follow the script, Meldenique resolutely abandons her old life and sets out to open… a stationery shop! Will she succeed in defying fate and building the stationery shop of her dreams?

---

description.fr:
«Une chose inutile comme toi n’a aucune valeur dans notre famille. Prends cet argent et pars immédiatement!»

«Oui! Au revoir!»

Elle est devenue la méchante incompétente qui commet des actes répréhensibles afin de gagner l’amour de son fiancé, le protagoniste. Sa réputation était déjà au plus bas et les personnages principaux, qui ne peuvent pas vivre l’un sans l’autre, ont une liaison.

«Se faire virer et recevoir de l’argent, c’est déjà bien!»

Ainsi, après avoir été mise à la porte, elle a ouvert une papeterie devant une école. Elle se souvient des snacks, des bonbons à la bière, et même des bulles ! Attendez, les enfants ! Mais… ses jeunes clients sont un peu bizarres?

«Je te trouverai un homme beau et modeste, et pas quelqu’un qui a une liaison comme mon frère!»

«Ha, alors qu’en est-il de mon frère, le prince héritier?»

«…le maître de la tour est le meilleur.»

Le grand épéiste magique, le prince héritier, le méchant maître de la tour, et enfin, le méchant caché. La papeterie, qu’elle pensait être paisible, ne lui laissait aucun répit. Aidez-moi! Je voulais juste vivre une vie normale!

description.ko:
남주의 약혼녀이지만, 그의 사랑을 받기 위해 악행을 저지르는 무능한 악녀에 빙의했다. 
이미 평판은 밑바닥이고, 서로 죽고 못 사는 주인공들은 저들끼리 불륜까지 막 저지르는 막장 상황. 

"너 같이 쓸모 없는 것은 우리 가문에 있을 가치가 없다. 이 돈을 받고 썩 꺼지거라!"
"네! 안녕히 계세요!" 

그래서 냉큼 돈 받고 쫓겨나 학교 앞에 추억의 문구점을 차렸다. 
추억의 쫀드기, 맥주사탕, 비눗방울 놀이까지! 어린이들 기다려! 

그런데.... 어쩐지 내 어린 고객님들이 좀 이상하다? 

"내가, 우리 오빠 같은 불륜남 말고 잘생기고 조신한 남자 찾아 줄게요!"
"헉, 그럼 황태자이신 우리 형님은 어때?" 
"....마탑주님이 최고야." 

그렇게 위대한 마검, 차기 황태자, 악역인 마탑주, 그리고 최종 흑막까지 엮이게 되면서 
평화로울 줄만 알았던 문구점에는 하루도 바람 잘 날이 없는데. 

살려줘! 난 그냥 평범하게 살고 싶었을 뿐이라고!

---

description.pt:
O que uma garota deve fazer quando acorda no corpo de uma vilã? Meldenique Babelloa é uma personagem coadjuvante em um romance estrelado por seu noivo, o duque Lennox Hessman, e… sua irmã, Sheria! Com o coração partido, ela eventualmente morre uma morte trágica como uma vilã… ou assim diz a história original. Determinada a não seguir o roteiro, Meldenique abandona resolutamente sua antiga vida e se propõe a abrir... uma papelaria! Será que ela conseguirá desafiar o destino e construir a papelaria dos seus sonhos?

description.ru:
"Такая бесполезная вещь, как ты, не имеет ценности в нашей семье. Возьми эти деньги и немедленно уходи!"
 "Хорошо! Прощай!"
Она стала некомпетентной злодейкой, которая совершает проступки, чтобы заслужить любовь своего жениха, главного героя.
Её репутация уже была на дне, и главные герои, которые не могут жить друг без друга, заводят роман.
" Быть выгнанным и получать деньги - это хорошо!"
Поэтому после того, как её выгнали, она открыла магазин канцелярских товаров перед школой. Она продаёт закуски, пивные конфеты и даже пузыри! Погодите, детки!
Но… почему-то её молодые клиенты немного странные?
"Я найду тебе красивого и скромного мужчину, а не такого , у которого есть роман, как у моего брата!"
"Ха, а что насчет моего брата, крон-принца?"
"… мастер башни - лучший. *
Великий магический фехтовальщик, следующий кронпринц, злодейский хозяин башни и, наконец, скрытый злодей.
Магазин канцелярских товаров, который, как она думала, будет мирным, не оставлял ей покоя.
Помогите мне! Я просто хотела жить нормальной жизнью!

description.uk:
— Ти ганьбиш ім'я нашої родини. Забирай ці гроші та вали звідси!
-Чудово! Бувай!

Вона прийшла до тями ні на що не здатною злодійкою, яка творила зло, щоб завоювати любов її нареченого, головного героя.

Її репутація і так була на дні, а головні герої, які не можуть жити один без одного, закрутили роман.
-Мене хоч і виперли, але дали гроші - вже непогано!

Після того, як її вигнали з дому, вона відкрила перший магазин канцелярських товарів перед школою. Крім іншого, там продаються закуски, солодощі та навіть жуйка! Ну, дітлахи, тримайтеся!
Але... Чому її юні клієнти такі дивні?

-Я знайду тобі гарного і скромного хлопця, а не дурня, що ходить ліворуч, як мій брат!
-Ха, а як щодо мого брата, наслідного принца?
—Господар Башти просто найкращий.

Великий магічний воїн, королівський принц, жахливий власник вежі та таємничий лиходій.

Мирне життя, яке вона хотіла від магазину канцелярії, обернулася зовсім інакше.
Допоможіть! Я просто хотіла жити нормальним життям!

description.vi:
“Một thứ vô dụng như mày không xứng đáng ở trong gia đình này. Cầm lấy số tiền này và cút đi!” “Được rồi! Tạm biệt!” Cô trở thành một nhân vật phản diện bất tài, thực hiện những hành vi sai trái để giành được tình yêu của vị hôn phu của mình, nam chính. Danh tiếng của cô đã xuống đáy và các nhân vật chính, những người vốn không thể sống thiếu nhau, đang có quan hệ tình cảm với nhau. “Bị đuổi ra ngoài mà được nhận tiền là quá tốt rồi!” Vì vậy, sau khi cô ấy bị đuổi ra khỏi nhà, cô ấy đã mở một cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm ở phía trước của một trường học. Cô ấy hồi tưởng lại về đồ ăn nhẹ, kẹo bia, và thậm chí cả chơi với bong bóng xà phòng! Các em chỉ cần chờ thôi, mấy nhóc à! Nhưng… Không hiểu sao những khách hàng trẻ tuổi của cô lại có chút kỳ lạ? “Em sẽ tìm cho chị một chàng trai đẹp mã và khiêm tốn, và cả chưa từng yêu ai như anh trai em chẳng hạn!” “Ha, vậy còn anh trai em, hoàng thái tử thì sao?” “… Chủ tháp là tuyệt nhất. ” Kiếm sĩ ma thuật vĩ đại, tiếp đó là hoàng thái tử, chủ nhân của tòa tháp tàn độc và cuối cùng là nhân vật phản diện giấu mặt. Cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm mà cô tưởng chừng sẽ yên bình lại khiến cô không nghỉ ngơi được.

description.zh:
“像你这样没用的东西在我们家毫无价值，拿上这笔钱，马上离开!”

“是的!再见!”

她成为了一个无能的女反派，为了赢得她的未婚夫——男主角的爱，她做了很多错事。她的名声已经跌到谷底，而主角们，不能离开彼此，却有了外遇。

“被踢出去收钱就够了!”

在她被赶出来后，她在一所学校前开了一家文具店。她回忆起零食，啤酒糖果，甚至泡泡!孩子们，等着瞧吧!

但不知怎的，她的年轻顾客有点奇怪?

“我会给你找个英俊而谦虚的男人，而不是像我哥哥那样有外遇的人!”

“哈，那我的哥哥太子呢?”

“……塔的主人是最好的。”

伟大的神剑手，下一任王储，恶毒的塔主，隐藏的恶棍。

她本以为她的文具店会很安静，但现在却让她无法休息。

帮帮我!我只想过正常的生活!

description.zh-hk:
她附身在了雖是男主的未婚妻，但卻為了得到男主的愛而做下惡行的無能惡女身上。

風評已經到底了，還身處沒有彼此不能活的主角之間出軌的狗血狀況。

“像你這樣沒用的東西待在我們家族沒有任何價值。拿著這些錢滾吧！” “是！再見！” 所以立刻拿了錢被趕出去，在學校門前開了一家記憶中的文具店。

回憶中的橡皮糖，啤酒糖，再到吹肥皂泡泡！小孩子們等著吧！但是... 我的小客人怎麼有點兒奇怪？

“我，不要我哥哥那樣的出軌男，給你找長得帥的正經男人！” “嗬，那麼我哥哥皇太子怎麼樣？” “.…魔法塔主是最棒的。”

就那樣偉大的魔劍，下一任皇太子，反派魔法塔主，還被牽扯到最終的黑幕之中，本以為很平和的文具店沒有一天風平浪靜。

救救我！我只是想過平凡的生活！

altTitles.en: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead
I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

title.en: In the Name of Bai Ze

description.en: Several decades ago, the young boy Bai Ze mistakenly entered a mystical world's immortal mountain and formed a bond with an Immortal Gege. Over ten years later, the college student Baize once again arrives in the mystical realm, only to discover that the Immortal Gege he had dreamed of day and night has become a pitiable figure forgotten by the mortal world. In a world where demons and monsters wreak havoc, the unfortunate originator turns out to be this pitiful divine being. Unable to ignore the situation, Bai Ze forcefully brings his Immortal Gege back into the mortal realm, helping him fulfill his desire for a peaceful life. After all, who could resist someone so beautiful, powerful yet pitiful?
description.pl: Młody chłopiec o imieniu Bai Ze przypadkiem wszedł do mistycznego świata, w którym normalne było potwory i bóstwa. Zaprzyjaźnił się tam z przystojnym nieśmiertelnym mężczyzną, lecz musiał wracać do rodziców. Ponad dziesięć lat później Bai Ze ponownie trafia do tajemniczego wymiaru, gdzie odkrywa, że poznane uprzednio bóstwo, o którym śnił nocami i dniami, stało się zapomnianą przez wszystkich postacią. Nie będąc w stanie tego zignorować, Bai Ze siłą zabiera go do swojego świata, pomagając mu spełnić marzenie o spokojnym życiu.
description.zh: 十数年前，小正太白泽误入异世仙山，与神仙大哥哥结缘。 十数年后，大学生白泽再次来到异世，却发现日思夜梦的神仙大哥哥成了被人世遗忘的可怜人 世间妖魔作乱，始作俑者却就是这个可怜兮兮的神仙。 没办法，白泽硬拉着神仙哥哥重新入世，帮他完成安稳世间的愿望，谁让他又美又强又惨呢？

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

altTitles.ja: 瞬きのエンドロール

description.en: Two eighteen-year-old friends embarked on a trip after they graduated. “This will be the last time before I let go of my feelings for you…” These were the thoughts of Liam, who had been in love with his childhood friend, Lucas, for years—a secret he had kept until one fateful night at prom, when he got so drunk that he accidentally kissed Lucas. As much as he tried to avoid it, he couldn't stop thinking about how these unrestrained feelings overwhelms him. “If things continue this way, we won't be able to remain friends anymore.” Having made the decision to give up on love, Liam planned a graduation trip with Lucas, hoping to create one last cherished memory together. They set off in a worn-out car with the sea as their destination, embarking on a journey where a different kind of love would blossom between these two childhood friends.

During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

Tired of being picked on, Yeongha, the new transfer student, decides to fight back… and discovers he can pack a punch. He soon becomes the top of the food chain, savoring his new title as the toughest guy at school. But he meets his match when Suho Kang, the Champion of the PVP games, single-handedly takes down him and his crew. To earn back his honor, Yeongha decides to join the PVP games. Will he finally get the satisfaction of beating Suho up? Or will he gain something more?
description.tr: Okula yeni transfer olan Yeongha, sürekli olarak kendisinin ve arkadaşlarının zorbalığa uğramasından bıkmıştı. Bu duruma karşı koymak için kararlılıkla harekete geçti ve kendi elinin ne kadar ağır olduğunu keşfetti. Kısa sürede, okulda ki herkesi ezerek en güçlü çocuk ünvanının tadını çıkardı. Ancak PVP oyunlarının şampiyonu Suho Kang, onun ve ekibinin karşısına tek başına çıktığında, Yeongha gerçek gücünün sınırlarını anlamak zorunda kaldı. Onurunu ve Ünvanını geri kazanmak için PVP oyunlarına katılmaya karar veren Yeongha, sonunda Suho’yu yenmeyi başarabilecek midir?

altTitles.en: Full Marks Hidden Marriage: Pick Up a Son, Get a Free Husband
Hidden Marriage 100 points: Provoke a Wife to Marry One Get One Free
The Lovely Wife And Strange Marriage

altTitles.zh: 隐婚100分：惹火娇妻嫁一送一

altTitles.zh-ro: Xǔ nǐ Wànzhàng Guāngmáng Hǎo - Yǐn Hūn 100 Fēn: Rěhuǒ Hiāo Qī Jià Yī Sòng Yī

description.en: Her boyfriend was taken from her, her parents were ashamed of her and she was exiled abroad without consent! Everyone thought she was abandoned and only she could fend for herself… After five years, Ning Xi returns to fulfil her childhood dream of becoming a famous actress. However, her sister is still out to sabotage her every chance she gets! What schemes will she have to avoid?
description.fr:
Ning Xi est tombée bien bas : son petit ami lui a été volé, ses parents l’ont reniée et envoyée à l’étranger, et sa pire ennemie est prête à tout pour lui mettre des bâtons dans les roues ! Mais Ning Xi n’a plus envie de s’apitoyer sur son sort. Après cinq ans d’absence, elle revient, prête à se venger et à atteindre un objectif bien précis : devenir la reine du cinéma ! Mais sur sa route… elle rencontrera le beau Lu Ting Xiao qui fera chavirer son cœur !  
Envoyer un message à @Tacky
description.id: """Sang pewaris telah mengubah identitasnya? Aku mengalami penderitaan saat kembali ke keluarga asliku? Kekasihku menghianatiku untuk adik perempuanku? Tidak hanya itu, aku juga disakiti oleh seseorang hingga kehilangan anak yang sedang kukandung dan diasingkan oleh keluarga sendiri? Bisakah kemalanganku melebihi ini? Tapi jangan khawatir. Tunggu sampai aku memasuki organisasi misterius itu‒aku akan menjadi orang baru, kembali menjadi lebih kuat, dan mulai merencanakan balas dendamku! Tetapi kemudian seorang pria‒ seorang pemimpin perusahaan dan ayah tunggal‒ memintaku untuk tinggal bersamanya? Apa yang sebenarnya sedang terjadi?!"""

description.en:
Youour Highness- That is absurd!!

"Youour Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

"It's doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ imperovished novel from the early 2000s!"

For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Youour Highness! Please have mercy!"
"Youour Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"
"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"
Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too.

"Can I survive here and return home?"

title.en: Kono Setsugen de Kimi ga Zutto Waratte Irareru you ni

altTitles.ja: この雪原で君がずっと笑っていられるように

altTitles.en: May This Snowfield Keep You Smiling All the Time

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Setsugen de Kimi ga Zutto Waratteirareru You ni

description.en:
"You've escaped from all your suffering, so I'll make sure you know happiness for the rest of your life."

Shiroshika Muku's childhood ended ten years ago when her father died, her best friend moved to Tokyo, and she, together with her mom and little sister, had to go to live with her grandparents. Trying to fulfill the role her father left behind, Muku, a now 21-year-old woman, feels like drowning. 

She needs to care of her grandfather, who has dementia, and find a new job after the company she started working for after graduating high school went bankrupt, so she can pay her grandfather's medical expenses and the school expenses of her little sister. She also needs to help her mother with the housework and listen to how her grandmother tells her she is not good enough simply because she is a woman, as well as the importance of having a man around.

She needs to run away and live her life for herself before she starts hating the family she loves so much, but with nowhere to go, this seems impossible. That is, until her childhood friend Yuto returns after ten years, on a snowy day...

altTitles.ja: 303号室の神さま
神様です。サービスするよ
神様と陰気な少年

altTitles.en: I'm a God. I'll serve you.

altTitles.vi: Tôi là một vị thần. Tôi sẽ giúp bạn
Thần và cậu bé u ám

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba no Monogatari - Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.th: ลิขิตรักบัลลังก์ต่างโลก

altTitles.ja: 異世界の皇妃

description.en: Crossing over into another world and time after a freak accident, Korean highschool girl Sabina is taken in by a duke of the Crentia kingdom— only to soon be offered up to the ugly old emperor as a concubine. When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?

The childhood loser became the perfect man and reappeared in front of the female lead!
His name is ‘Yoon Garam’. He works as an author, and as soon as he heard that the female lead, ‘Yunseo’ works in a small publishing company, he decided to sign a contract there.
“I couldn’t forget you.”

The female lead, Yunseo, is shocked by the sudden confession, but she doesn’t want to embarrass her company. However, from the company’s point of view, his contract terms were too good to decline so they decided to sign the contract, but…!

altTitles.ja: 神の庭付き楠木邸

description.en:
Kusunoki Minato is given the job of caretaker of a house in the countryside. It is supposed to be a ridiculous property infested with evil spirits, but with his substandard powers, he unknowingly wipes out the evil spirits!
Attracted by the cosy atmosphere of the purified Kusunoki Residence, a host of unique deities begin to gather there!

A heartwarming countryside life with the neighbouring mountain gods - it's just the beginning.
A complicated web of relationships between two sets of childhood friends. How can all of them reach their happily ever after?

altTitles.ja: 双影双書

description.en: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en:
Lee Kyun, the Shepherd, is at the top of the pyramid of the Carnivore Class. Everything was perfect - other than the fact that he has a crush on his best friend, Choi Hae Beom, the Leopard. Too scared to confess, he thought he would be satisfied with just the title of "Best Friend," when a bottom-of-the-food-chain, zero-attack-power Golden Hamster appears and starts to show interest in Hae Beom. Between the two of them, who will manage to capture the Leopard's heart?!

#BL #ShortSeries #Cute #Sweet #SchoolSetting #Hybrids #UnrequitedLove #LoveTriangle #NiceTop #CuteBottom

altTitles.ja: とっても優しいあまえちゃん！

description.en:
Amae-chan is so sweet, kind, tender… she makes me feel so happy.  
  
And then there's me, the disappointment of a manga artist. But I will not be discouraged as long as I have Amae-chan with me!

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス
Megami no Kafeterasu

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

title.en: Dungeon ga Arawarete 5-nen, 15-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンが現れて5年、15歳でダンジョンに挑むことにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ga Arawarete Go-nen, Juugo-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.

altTitles.es-la: 5 AÑOS DESPUÉS DE QUE APARECIERAN LAS DUNGEONS, ME ATREVO A DESAFIARLAS A LA EDAD DE 15 AÑOS

altTitles.en: Five Years After The Dungeons Appeared, I Dare to Challenge at The Age of 15

description.en:
Dungeons appeared in the world five years ago. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful.

Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.

This story is about how Yuuta, under such circumstances, became stronger than anyone else, becoming one of the twelve individuals capable of moving the world, known as the ‘Twelve Heroes.’

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~
I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the "The Eminence in Shadow" setting in a different world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called "Seven Shadows" (they are very serious). Then the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The strongest of the seven (& the main character), overwhelmingly chuunibyou, and misunderstood serious comedy!?

After reuniting with someone who doesn’t even remember me, we became friends with benefits.
What’s even funnier is that after becoming friends with benefits, I secretly fell for him.

Jimin reunites with his old friend from swimming, Chanhyung, after becoming a college student. While Chanhyung is under the false assumption that Jimin is an older guy, the two become friends with benefits. Following this, although Jimin develops feelings for the kind and enigmatic Chanhyung, he cannot confess to him.

Even so, I thought that if I wasn’t too clingy, I’d be able to continue our relationship while pretending that I’m not who I really am.

“Uh, aren’t you Jimin?”

..Until I’m utterly caught like this.

altTitles.ja: ３組の幼なじみ

description.en: Depicts the journey of three sets of childhood friends - 'childhood friends with a physical difference,' 'childhood friends who are conscious of height differences,' and 'childhood friends with an age gap' - until they start dating.

altTitles.en: Becoming a God by Being the Center of Attention

description.en: With the constant development of technology on Earth, people no longer need to worship the weather gods. Because of this, the rain god, Yushi’s, power starts disappearing. He decides to venture onto Earth under the name “Shiyu” in order to restore his power. Soon scouted by an evil boss into a near-bankrupt entertainment company. Shiyu is sent to participate in the show “I am an idol.” With absolutely zero common sense he somehow still manages to gain popularity and debut in the group SWEN alongside three other members. Overtime, Shiyu comes to discover that his groupmate, Yang Dongjun, and Zhong Yun were also gods who came to the world to work and earn faith…
description.tr: Dünya teknolojisinin sürekli olarak gelişmesi ile insanların artık hava ile ilgilenen Tanrılara ibadet etmesine ihtiyaçları kalmaz. Bu sebeple Yağmur Tanrısı, Yushi'nin, gücü kaybolmaya başlar. Gücünü yenilemek için 'Shiyu' ismi altında Dünya'ya gitmeye karar verir. Kısa süre sonra kötü bir patron tarafından iflas etmek üzere olan bir eğlence şirketinde keşfedilir. Shiyu 'Ben Bir İdolüm' adlı programa katılım göstermesi için gönderilir. Sahip olduğu sıfır sağduyu ve diğer üç üye ile birlikte SWEN grubunda bir şekilde popülerlik kazanmayı ve çıkış yapmayı başarır. Mesai sırasında grup arkadaşları Tan Donjun ve Zhong Yun'un da kendisi gibi inanç kazanmak için Dünya'ya gelen Tanrılar olduğunu keşfeder.

altTitles.ja: 青のオーケストラ

description.en:
Aono Hajime was a prodigy violinist until he grew jaded with playing the violin due to personal reasons. 
Now in his third year of middle school, he struggles to decide his academic path. 
One day in school, he meets Akine Ritsuko, a hotheaded novice violinist who wants to enroll in a high school with a distinguished orchestra club. 
When he finds himself getting closer to Ritsuko and being brought back to the world of violinists, time starts moving again for him.  
  
This is the beginning of a youthful drama where sounds and hearts alike resound in harmony.

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Call of the Night**
description.tr: Aono Hajime, kişisel nedenlerden dolayı keman çalmayı bırakana kadar harika bir kemancıydı. Şimdi ortaokulun üçüncü yılında akademik yoluna karar vermek için mücadele ediyor. Bir gün okulda, seçkin bir orkestra kulübü olan bir liseye kaydolmak isteyen agresif, acemi bir kemancı olan Akine Ritsuko ile tanışır. Kendisini Ritsuko'ya yaklaşırken ve kemancıların dünyasına geri getirilirken bulan Aono için zaman tekrar hareket etmeye başlar. Bu, seslerin ve kalplerin benzer şekilde uyum içinde olduğu genç bir dramanın başlangıcıdır.

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

altTitles.ja: サジちゃんの病み日記

description.en: Sazi-chan has a girl she likes. Though her feelings are too pure for anyone to understand, it is definitely true love. Taking pictures, stealing, stabbing, assaulting, that too, is love.

altTitles.en: The Law Of Being Friends With A Male

altTitles.ja: 男友達って彼氏になれる?

description.en: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes, When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on, his friend Jiwoon, who’s crush is actually towards Jay, was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else, after that, Jay asked her about her crush, Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them, The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!
description.fr: La première romance de Jiun s'est terminée lorsque son béguin, Jae-i, lui avoue qu'il aime quelqu'un d'autre. Pour aggraver les choses, Jae-i croit à tort que le béguin de Jiun est son effrayant meilleur ami, Seohyeon, et il tente de l'aider à gagner le cœur de celui-ci. Maintenant, Jiun doit faire face à un plus gros problème qu'un amour à sens unique, le petit-copain qu'elle n'a jamais imaginé se rapprocher.
description.ko:
남몰래 '재이'를 짝사랑해온 '지운'.  재이가 자신에게 고백할 줄 알았던 지운은, 재이의 짝사랑 상대가 다른 사람이라는 사실을 알고는 정신이 아득해진다. 
짝사랑이 허무하게 끝났다고 생각함과 동시에, 재이가 자신의 짝사랑 상대를 '서현'이라고 착각하고 있다는 걸 알게 된다. 
그저 재이의 키 크고 덩치 큰 친구 중 하나일 뿐인, 말 그대로 남자인 사람 친구일 뿐인 서현과 자신을 이어주려는 재이의 행동에 해탈하고 마는데...

title.en: Isekai ni Shoukan Saretan Dakedo, Nandemo Kireteshimau Kennou wo Teni Ireta node Easy Mode Deshita

altTitles.en: I Was Summoned to Another World, but I Got the Power to Cut Anything, so It Was Easy Mode

altTitles.ja: 異世界に召喚されたんだけど、なんでも斬れてしまう権能を手に入れたのでイージーモードでした

description.en:
With the divine power known as the ability “Ripper,” unrivaled in its might!

During a class, Haruki Ito, along with all his classmates, is summoned to another world. One day after the summoning, Haruki discovers the power that has been bestowed upon him…?!

[Web Novel Raw](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3031gx/)
description.ja:
伊藤晴樹は授業中、クラスメイトと全員一緒に異世界に召喚されてしまう。召喚後のある日、晴樹は自身が与えられた権能にを知ることになって…!?
 
--- 
 
Itō Haruki wa jugyō-chū, kurasumeito to zen'in issho ni i sekai ni shōkan sa rete shimau. Shōkan-go no aru hi, Haruki wa jishin ga atae rareta ken'nō ni o shiru koto ni natte...!?

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.ja-ro: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

title.en: Sono Monban, Saikyou Nitsuki: Tsuihou Sareta Bougyo Ryoku 9999 no Senshi, Outo no Monban Toshite Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: その門番、最強につき～追放された防御力9999の戦士、王都の門番として無双する～

altTitles.en: That Gatekeeper, Because He is the Strongest ~ The Exiled Warrior with 9999 Defense Power, Unmatched as the Gatekeeper of the Royal Capital

altTitles.zh-hk: 那個門衛最強～被退隊的防禦力9999的戰士，作為王都的門衛無雙～

altTitles.es-la: Ese guardián de la puerta, porque es el más fuerte ~ El guerrero exiliado con 9999 de poder de defensa, inigualable como guardián de la puerta de la capital real.

description.en: Sieg is an adventurer with an incredible defensive power, and he always uses himself to attract the monsters' attention to assist his teammates. However, the party leader just focused on offense without realizing Sieg's intention, so he kicked him out. After Sieg left, the team repeatedly failed multiple quests … At the same time, Sieg took the position of gatekeeper at the Royal Capital. Thanks to his defensive power, he was quickly promoted to division captain. His subordinates included a carefree big-breasted Swordswoman, a perverse freakish girl, and an Archer with an erratic temperament. He and the girls started slowly gaining the trust of people around them!
description.es-la: Sieg es un aventurero con un poder defensivo increíble, y siempre se usa a sí mismo para atraer la atención de los monstruos para ayudar a sus compañeros de grupo. Sin embargo, el líder del grupo se centró en la ofensiva sin darse cuenta de la intención de Sieg, por lo que lo echó. Después de que Sieg se fue, el grupo falló repetidamente en múltiples misiones... Al mismo tiempo, Sieg tomó el puesto de guardián en la Capital Real. Gracias a su poder defensivo, rápidamente fue ascendido a capitán de división. Sus subordinados incluían una espadachina despreocupada de grandes pechos, una chica monstruosa y perversa y una arquera con un temperamento errático. ¡Él y las chicas comenzaron a ganarse lentamente la confianza de las personas que los rodeaban!

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

altTitles.ja: きみとピコピコ

description.en: Oota, an otaku, joined the game club to live his ideal high school life. That was when he met by chance the freshman gal, Ageha Onisaki!! They dive straight into playing video games, but Ageha's choices are the Famicom (NES), the Super Famicom (SNES), and the Megadrive (Sega Genesis)! Who the heck is this person!? Playing a wide range from famous to retro games, the gal and the otaku start their heart-throbbing life!
description.pt-br: Oota, um otaku, ingressou no clube de jogos para viver sua vida ideal de colegial. Foi quando ele conheceu por acaso a caloura Ageha Onisaki!! Eles mergulham direto nos videogames, mas as escolhas de Ageha são NES, SNES e Megadora! Quem diabos é essa garota!? Jogando uma ampla variedade de jogos retrôs famosos, gal e o otaku começam sua agitada vida juntos!

description.en: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: 恋愛代行

description.en: A half-Swedish, half-Japanese girl who seems to have everything except experience with men is using a date coaching app to get used to flirting. However the guy she hits it off with actually uses the same app with a different coach!
description.id:
Renai Daikou (Love Agency) – Agen Cinta
Akasaka Aka x Nishizawa 5mm
Akasaka Aka, yang telah membuat sejarah dalam sejarah komedi romantis dengan “Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen”, kembali dengan komedi romantis baru! Tim baru ini bekerja sama dengan Nishizawa 5mm, seorang pendatang baru yang sedang menjadi topik hangat di dunia manga online! Ini adalah awal dari “komedi
description.ru:
Девушка со шведскими и японскими корнями, у которой, кажется, есть всё, кроме опыта общения противоположным полом, использует приложение для обучения свиданиям, чтобы научиться флиртовать.
Однако парень, с которым у нее завязываются отношения, использует то же приложение с другим тренером!
description.uk:
Ака Акасака, автор "Каґуя-сама хоче, щоб він зізнався їй. Війна сердець та розумів геніїв" та "Дитя улюбленця", презентує свій новий витвір!

У Марі Марії Вінтер-Нанасе, наполовину шведки, наполовину японки, є все, про що можна мріяти. Дівчина виросла в заможній родині закордоном, має багато подруг і вродливу зовнішність. Однак є в ній один недолік: вона не вміє розмовляти з хлопцями!

Узявши в бібліотеці книгу про кохання, у ній вона знайшла підозрілу рекламу. Там йшлося про Агентство Кохання, що надає профі в коханні, який упорається з вашим особистим життям за вас. Після того, як дівчина відсканувала код, з'являється агентка, на ім'я Кон, та обіцяє допомогти Марі зійтися з її коханим. Однак хлопець, що припав їй до душі, Секі Масая, не такий уже й невинний і також користується послугами агентства, щоб почати зустрічатися з нею. Як складеться доля цієї пари?
description.vi: Tác phẩm của Akasaka Aka (tác giả của Oshi no Ko và Kaguya-sama) và Nishizawa 5mm. Một cô gái mang trong mình dòng máu Thụy Điển và Nhật Bản cực kỳ ưu tú nhưng cô ấy lại không có kinh nghiệm với đàn ông. Cô ấy quyết định sử dụng một ứng dụng dịch vụ tình yêu để chinh phục chàng trai ấy. Tuy nhiên, anh chàng mà cô ấy nhắm đến cũng đang sử dụng ứng dụng đó để chinh phục cô!
description.pt-br: Uma garota meio sueca/meio japonesa que parece ter tudo, exceto experiência com homens, está usando um aplicativo de coaching para encontros para se acostumar a flertar. No entanto, o cara com quem ela se dá bem na verdade usa o mesmo aplicativo com um treinador diferente!

altTitles.ja: これ描いて死ね

description.en:
Yasumi Ai. She's a first-year high school student living on Izu Ōshima, an island that's part of Tokyo prefecture. She loves to read manga, but a certain event triggered her to start thinking about "creating" manga. She begins to think about "creating" manga. What is the world that awaits her? A manga by Minoru Toyoda, a manga artist who loves manga! The pain and joy of creating works of art. No expense is spared in this tale of growing up and manga adventure!

----
Note: Won the 16th Manga Taisho Award in 2023.
description.pt-br:
Yasumi Ai. Ela é uma estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio que vive em Izu Oshima, uma ilha que faz parte da província de Tóquio. Ela adora ler mangás, mas um certo evento a levou a começar a pensar em "criar" mangás.

Qual é o mundo que a espera? Um mangá de Minoru Toyoda, um artista de mangá que adora mangá! A dor e a alegria de criar obras de arte. Nenhuma despesa é poupada neste conto de crescimento e aventura de mangá!

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界おじさん

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

title.en: Tensei Akuma no Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei Keikaku

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Devil’s Plan for Raising the Strongest Hero

altTitles.ja: 転生悪魔の最強勇者育成計画

description.en:
Kakyu, a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level demon in hell, has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However, unexpectedly, he is exiled to another “different world,” liberated from the harsh underworld.

Kakyu, who was enjoying his dream slow life, witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene, the village is annihilated.

Picking up the only surviving baby, Alus, Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt…!?
description.id: Kakyu, yang dulunya orang jepang terlahir kembali sebagai iblis tingkat rendah di neraka, telah memperoleh kekuatan yang tak tertandingi selama dua ribu tahun. Namun, dengan tak terduga, ia diasingkan ke “dunia lain” yang berbeda, terbebas dari dunia bawah yang keras. Kakyu, yang menikmati hidup lambat impian, menyaksikan desa tempat dia berhutang segalanya diserang. Meskipun bergegas ke tempat kejadian, desa tersebut dihancurkan. Mengangkat bayi yang selamat, Ars, Kakyu bertekad untuk membesarkan Ars agar menjadi orang paling bahagia di dunia untuk membayar hutangnya…!?

altTitles.ja: 甘い生活

description.en:
The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. 
One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies 
(was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.

title.en: Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Sono Chiyushi, Jitsu wa Saikyou Nitsuki

altTitles.en: The Healer Who Was Banished From His Party, Is, in Fact, the Strongest

altTitles.ja: パーティーから追放されたその治癒師、実は最強につき

description.en:
A healer gets booted from his party because the leader notices he isn’t really contributing much to the team.

Soon enough, the healer must look for new members to party with. After finding a cute martial artist to work together with, he reveals his secret - while he’s a fairly mediocre healer, he actually fights well in close combat.

Anyway, here’s the story of a support who’s secretly a DPS, and where the entire conflict stems from the fact that he never told his old party he was DPS.
description.pt-br:
Um curandeiro é expulso de sua equipe porque o líder percebe que ele não está contribuindo muito para a equipe.  
O curandeiro deve procurar novos membros para formar uma equipe. Depois de encontrar uma linda artista marcial com quem quer trabalhar, ele revela seu segredo, embora seja um curandeiro medíocre, ele realmente luta bem no combate corpo a corpo.
De qualquer forma, aqui está a história de um suporte que é secretamente um DPS, e onde todo o conflito decorre do fato de que ele nunca disse a sua antiga equipe que era DPS.
